name: ezmaster-gitbook
description: Web server to deploy gitbook formatted documentation

scripts.build-gitbook: rsync -avz --exclude=.git /app/doc/ /app/src/ && rsync -avz --exclude=.git --exclude=README.md /app/config/ /app/src/ && cd /app/src && gitbook install && gitbook build
scripts.version: npm run insertversion:readme && npm run insertversion:makefile && npm run insertversion:docker && git add README.md Makefile docker-compose.debug.yml docker-compose.yml
